channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poo bin needed, 1st October
item.description:
The only two dog po bins from Pirton corner through yewtree way oakhurst close has a poo bin by oakhurst park and a poo bin yewtree way garages so u need to carry all the way round a dog walk if there were a bin on Pirton lane opposite Morley avanue then the bustop bin wouldn't get full of poo and a bin in aria marked hawthorn drive and maybe on green on Entrance to oakhurst close there wouldn't be so many overflowing and people leving the mess from a dog walker prospective
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakhurst Close, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 1st October
